title: Top Places to visit in Bhavnagar, Gujarat
content: Bhavnagar is a city in the Bhavnagar district of the Saurashtra region of the Gujarat state of India. It was founded in 1724 by Bhavsinhji Gohil (1703–1764). It was the capital of Bhavnagar State, which was a Princely state before it was merged into the Indian Union in 1948. It is now admin

title: Top Places to visit in Bharuch, Gujarat
content: Bharuch, formerly known as Broach,[a] or Bhrugukachchha is a City at the mouth of the river Narmada in Gujarat in western India. title: Top Places to visit in Banaskantha, Palanpur, Gujarat
content: Banaskantha district is one among the thirty-three districts of the Gujarat state of India. The administrative headquarters of the district is at Palanpur which is also its largest city. The district is located in the Northeast of Gujarat and is presumably named after the West Banas River which r

title: Top Places to visit in Aravalli, Modasa, Gujarat
content:
Aravalli district is a district in the state of Gujarat in India that came into being on August 15, 2013, becoming the 29th district of the state. The district has been carved out of the Sabarkantha district. The district headquarters are at Modasa.

content: Gujarat is a state on the western coast of India with a coastline of 1,600 km (990 mi) – most of which lies on the Kathiawar peninsula – and a population in excess of 60 million. It is the sixth largest Indian state by area and the ninth largest state by population. Gujarat is bordere

title: Top Places to visit in South Goa, Margao, Goa
content: South Goa is one of two districts that comprises the state of Goa in West India, within the region known as the Konkan. It is bounded by the district of North Goa to the north, the Uttara Kannada district of Karnataka state to the east and south, while the Arabian Sea forms its western coast.

title: Top Places to visit in North Goa, Panaji, Goa
content: North Goa is one of the two districts that make up the state of Goa in India. The district has an area of 1736 km², and is bounded by Sindhudurg district of Maharashtra state to the north and by Belgaum district of Karnataka to the east, by South Goa District to the south, and by the Arabian

title: Top Places to visit in West Karbi Anglong, Hamren, Assam
content: The West Karbi Anglong district is a new district formed out of the existing Karbi Anglong District of Assam in 2016. Hamren is the headquarter of the newly formed district. title: Top Places to visit in Udalguri, Assam
content:
Udalguri district, is a district in the Bodoland Territorial Area of the state of Assam in north-eastern India. Udalguri town is the headquarters of the district.
